name: The Man In The Frame
description:
Game for Mini Jam 121: Reflection about The Man and his Frame. 

Playable only from keyboard. 

Art assets from:

https://dani-maccari.itch.io/1bit-platformer-doungeoun

https://lazy-fox.itch.io/1-bit-8x8-universal-asset
